mapper.select: select a.id, a.processing, a.appoint_user_name, su.realname as appoint_real_name, a.work_type, a.plan_order_code, a.solve_status, if(a.solve_status =1,'已解决','未解决') as solve_status_name, if(a.recevice_time is null, a.assign_time, a.recevice_time) as recevice_time, a.start_time, a.end_time, a.arrive_time, a.file_path, a.fault_analysis, a.fault_phenomenon, a.maintenance_measures, a.sign_path, a.work_ticket_code, a.work_tick_path, a.symptoms from fault_repair_record a LEFT JOIN sys_user su on a.appoint_user_name = su.username where a.fault_code = #{faultCode} order by a.create_time desc

select a.maintenance_measures, su.realname as appoint_real_name from fault_repair_record a LEFT JOIN sys_user su on a.appoint_user_name = su.username where a.fault_code = #{faultCode} and a.solve_status = 1 order by a.create_time desc

select concat(d.name, '(', d.code, ')') `name`, count(d.`code`) `value` from fault_repair_record frr join fault_device fd on (frr.fault_code = fd.fault_code and fd.del_flag = 0) left join device d on (fd.device_code = d.code and d.del_flag = 0) where frr.del_flag = 0 and frr.appoint_user_name = #{userId} group by d.code order by `value` desc limit 5
